scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy:templates
scripts.copy:templates: mkdir -p dist/readings/love_connection dist/readings/birth_chart && (cp -R src/readings/love_connection/*.html dist/readings/love_connection/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -R src/readings/birth_chart/*.html dist/readings/birth_chart/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -R src/readings/love_connection/assets dist/readings/love_connection/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -R src/readings/birth_chart/assets dist/readings/birth_chart/ 2>/dev/null || true)
